sentences.cn: …又一杯加奎宁水的杜松子酒。

sentences.en: a gin and tonic with ice and lemon
sentences.cn: 一杯加冰和柠檬的杜松子补酒
请来一杯杜松子酒补剂.

sentences.en: He had gone out to get the gin. The cigarettes were nowhere.
sentences.cn: 他去外边拿杜松子酒了，烟不知放哪儿了。

sentences.en: He was knocking back his 10th gin and tonic of the day.
sentences.cn: 他正在大口喝着今天的第10杯加奎宁水的杜松子酒。

sentences.en: I'd like five gallons of gin.
I'll have a gin and tonic, please.
sentences.cn: 请来一杯加奎宁水的杜松子酒。

sentences.en: Keeler sipped at his gin and tonic.
sentences.cn: 基勒小口抿着他加了奎宁水的杜松子酒。

sentences.en: Melissa had guzzled gin and tonics like they were lemonade.
sentences.cn: 梅利莎像喝柠檬汽水一样大口地喝着加奎宁水的杜松子酒。

sentences.en: She added only a hint of vermouth to the gin.
sentences.cn: 她只在杜松子酒里加了少许苦艾酒。

sentences.en: She carried on serenely sipping her gin and tonic.
sentences.cn: 她继续安静地小口抿着加奎宁水的杜松子酒。

sentences.en: She was now on her umpteenth gin.
sentences.cn: 她已喝了无数杯杜松子酒了。

sentences.en: They caught the bartender stretching the gin with water.
sentences.cn: 那个酒吧招待在杜松子酒内掺水时被他们抓到了.
他们正在大喝杜松子酒.

sentences.en: With gin at 9p a tot, getting plastered is cheap and easy.
sentences.cn: 一小杯杜松子酒只要9便士，灌醉自己即便宜又容易。

words.tran_cn: [食品]杜松子酒；[农机]轧棉机；陷阱

phrases.tran_cn: 琴酒补剂；杜松子酒补剂

trans.tran_en: a strong alcoholic drink made mainly from grain, or a glass of this drink

trans.tran_cn: 喝杜松子酒； 用陷阱(或网)捕捉，诱捕(猎物)
